Title: Doing exercises
Designer: Li Wei (李維)Central Academy of Fine Arts, East China Branch (中央美術學院華東分院)
Publisher: Xin meishu chubanshe (新美术出版社), Shanghai
Notes: A woman doing exercises in the late evening (the clock says 22:25) while breastfeeding her baby. On the chair is a miner's helmet. Designer Li Wei probably had seen the well-known painting "Testing mother" from 1953.
